name: chart
description: Professional chart generation (line, bar, pie, horizontal bar, dashboards) via QuickChart.io + sharp compositor. Includes universal chart_generate for arbitrary data.
author: Kloveren (t.me/morganlegacy)

tools.name: market_chart
tools.description: Generate and send a price chart image for TON/jettons to the current chat

tools.name: gift_floor_chart
tools.description: Generate and send a gift collection floor price chart image using Giftstat data

tools.name: gift_top_movers
tools.description: Generate a horizontal bar chart showing TOP gift collections by price change (gainers and losers)

tools.name: chart_pie
tools.description: Generate a pie/doughnut chart — volume breakdowns, portfolio distribution, market share

tools.name: chart_bar
tools.description: Generate a vertical bar chart — daily volumes, comparisons, category breakdowns, grouped/stacked

tools.name: chart_dashboard
tools.description: Compose multiple chart images into a single dashboard image (dark theme, grid layout). Use with return_url_only from other chart tools.

tools.name: chart_generate
tools.description: Universal chart generator — create any chart from raw data arrays (line, multi_line, bar, horizontal_bar, pie, doughnut). Supports annotations, custom colors, stacked bars. For whale analytics, anomaly reports, and custom visualizations.
